events.title: Anniversary Concert - 60 Years Dorfkapelle Lauerbach
events.description: Celebrate with us 60 years of traditional brass music with heart from the Odenwald. A special program from six decades of club history.
events.short_description: 60 years of brass music - anniversary concert with special program

events.title: Erbach Wiesenmarkt 2025
events.description: Traditional morning pint with Dorfkapelle Lauerbach. Folk brass music in a cozy atmosphere.
events.short_description: Traditional morning pint at the region's largest folk festival

events.title: Lauerbach Village Festival
events.description: Cozy village festival with coffee, cake and brass music. An afternoon for the whole family.
events.short_description: Cozy village festival for the whole family

announcements.title: 60 Years Dorfkapelle Lauerbach - A Reason to Celebrate!
announcements.content: 2025 is a special year for Dorfkapelle Lauerbach e.V. - we celebrate our 60th anniversary! Since 1965 we have been delighting people from the entire Odenwald region with traditional brass music.
announcements.short_description: In 2025 we celebrate 60 years of brass music with heart from the Odenwald

announcements.title: New Members Welcome
announcements.content: We are happy about everyone who wants to join us. All brass instruments are welcome - from flute to tuba.
announcements.short_description: Become part of our music community

club_info.motto: Traditional brass music with heart from the Odenwald
club_info.description: Since 1965 we have been delighting people from the entire Odenwald region with traditional brass music. With over 30 active musicians of different generations, we maintain the tradition of folk brass music.
club_info.rehearsal_times: Every Thursday at 7:30 PM in the Lauerbach clubhouse

homepage.hero_subtitle: Traditional brass music with heart from the Odenwald
homepage.hero_text: Since 1965 we have been delighting people from the entire Odenwald region with traditional brass music.
homepage.welcome_text: With over 30 active musicians of different generations, we maintain the tradition of folk brass music and bring people together. Experience authentic village music at our performances or become part of our music community yourself.
homepage.members_teaser_text: Get to know our musicians - from young to old, all united by their love of brass music.
homepage.contact_teaser_text: Do you love brass music? We welcome new members of all ages and instruments.
homepage.seo_title: Dorfkapelle Lauerbach e.V. - Traditional brass music with heart from the Odenwald
homepage.seo_description: Since 1965 traditional brass music in the Odenwald. 30+ musicians, regular performances, new members welcome. Erbach, Hessen.
